column4: when I issue ping -b xxx..., only my router replies, why don't I see all the boxes on my lan responding?
that is because you are pinging the broadcast address and only your router is configured to respond due to DHCP running on it
ok, how]what do I need to do, to see/enable the other boxes, so they respond?
I suppose you would have to make each machine listen on the broadcast address, there are better ways of discovering machines than that tho
